competition_summary.context: competition from existing and new competitors; • the cyclical nature of the industry in which we operate and the industries of our customers, such as those in the construction industry; • costs we incur being more than anticipated, including as a result of inflation, and the inability to realize expected savings in the amounts or time frames planned; • our significant indebtedness (which totaled $11.4 billion at December 31, 2022) requires us to use a substantial portion of our cash flow for deb
